name: Dicey Golf
description:
From Mild Mountain to Death Dungeon, take your chance on this golf course like no other!

Spin the wheel to learn your fate, then take aim while you dodge the tide and skim the spikes.

How to Play:

  • Drag the mouse button to aim your shot
  • Release to shoot your way to victory (and golf claps!)
  • Scroll wheel to zoom 
  • Move mouse to pan camera

Credits:

  • Ben Cattley: Dev & art
  • Toby Rodway: Music & sound design
  • Nicole Atkinson: Level concept & design
